column1: We love our dogs. They love to race.

column5: Owned/Raced by: L Cole & C Rendle

column1: BIG TIME BRIE (1) - bumped back straight.
FANCY (2) - bumped after the start and dictated inwards. Tightened and checked first turn losing ground.
PORTLAND ECKLUND (3) - contact for a distance after the start. Bumped first turn.
HI HO TONTO (4) - contact after the start then inconvenienced shifting wider.
OUR SCARLETT (5) - bumped after the start then inconvenienced shifting wider first turn.

MOBILITY SCOOTER (6) - shifted in back straight making contact then gave ground losing contact with the field. Veterinary examination revealed pain at the insertion of right gracilis with a 21 day stand down imposed.
DJAY DYNAMIX (1) - raced in restricted room final straight.
PUZZLE TIN (8) - raced wide early and middle stages.
FERNANDO CHARM (1) - began awkwardly losing ground. Inconvenienced first turn shifting in off heels.
DOBBY WHO (2) - bumped several strides after the start. Contact for a distance racing into the first turn. Raced in restricted room for a distance rounding the bend making contact several occasions.
OSTAPENKO (3) - checked after the start losing ground then trailed the field. Veterinary examination revealed strained left triceps with a 21 day stand down imposed.
GET ME HOME (4) - bumped start. Jostled when tightened for a distance racing into the first turn becoming unbalanced shifting out making contact.
PORTLAND BERTY (5) - shifted in across heels after the start making contact on several occasions. Jostled for a distance racing into the first turn then hampered and forced wide losing ground.
OUR HOTROD (6) - contact several occasions rounding the bend. Contact concluding stages.
THEA WHO (7) - tightened and checked concluding stages.
XENA POPPY (8) - Inconvenienced first turn shifting in off heels.

column7: Trained by: J Udy & D Cottam

column1: THRILLING HUDSON (1) - inconvenienced shifting out off heels after the start. Contact rounding the bend getting forced wider.
RAINY RIVER (2) - contact rounding the bend shifting wider.
FORD MAN (4) - collided start. Contact first turn. Collided entering the final straight then shifted out contacting DIGGER ACE.
MONSOON MALABAR (5) - tightened and checked start losing ground.
DIGGER ACE (7) - dictated wider final bend. Contacted early in the final straight shifting wider.
GREY WAY (8) - slow away. Raced wide. Dictated wider final bend and again in the final straight.
GAIN CAPITAL (9/6) - collided start. Contact first turn. Collided entering the final straight.

WAITERIMU RIPPER (1) - tightened making contact first turn losing ground. Lost contact with the field rounding the bend. Veterinary examination revealed torn insertion of right gracilis with a 28 day stand down imposed.
NATIVE SCOUT (2) - Checked start shifting out. Shifted out back straight getting on heels losing ground. Raced wide for the remainder of the event.
SOPHIA NOIR (4) - bumped after the start. Shifted in off heels first turn making contact.
RAGING DEMON (5) - contact after the start.
BIG TIME CLARE (6) - began awkwardly then tightened losing ground. Contacted from behind back straight.
GO ALL LIN (7) - contact after the start. Raced wide.

column3: Mayhounds Racing Retirement Project Series Final

column5: Owned/Raced by: G A Lawrence & G E Lawrence

column1: LOOBY'S STORY (1) - bumped several occasions first turn.
FIREFLY LAFFEY (2) - bumped several occasions first turn.
MY BRO BOBBY (3) - collided after the start. Checked first turn shifting out abruptly off heels. Veterinary examination revealed pain in the left hind calf muscle with a 14 day stand down imposed.
JUST MADDIE (5) - collided after the start then checked.
COINTREAU TIME (7) - bumped after the start.
SMASH BURTON (9/6) - bumped after the start. Checked first turn. Collided rounding the bend.

column7: Trained by: J Udy & D Cottam

column1: SAUSAGE (1) - contacted from behind first turn.
PREROGATIVE (2) - bumped after the start. Raced in restricted room rounding the bend.
GO FALCON (3) - slow away then inconvenienced making contact for a distance losing ground. .
MADAM BUCKS (4) - bumped after the start. Tightened and hampered first turn losing ground.
PARTY EVERY DAY (5) - contact for a distance entering the first turn.
SNOOPY'S HERO (6) - slow away then inconvenienced shifting in making contact losing ground. Inconvenienced first turn shifting wider.
FLYING HUEY (7) - contact for a distance entering the first turn losing ground.

column5: Owned/Raced by: L Cole & C Rendle

column1: PORTLAND WONDER (1) - shifted out off heels first turn then raced wide.
JINJA LAD (2) - inconvenienced racing into the first turn.
SLY CATH (3) - tightened making contact after the start then dictated inwards. Checked first turn losing ground.
EL NARCO (4) - tightened and checked after the start. Checked first turn losing ground.

YELLA ELLA (5) - shifted in making contact for a distance after the start. Gave ground first turn going back onto other runners. Veterinary examination revealed strained scar tissue on insertion of gracilis with a 21 day stand down imposed.
MA CHERE (6) - tightened making contact start. Collided first turn.
MEDUSA WHO (7) - tightened making contact start shifting wider losing ground. Checked first turn shifting wider then continued to race wide for the remainder of the event.
TOO THE NAIL (3) - tightened making contact first turn.
THRILLING BRUCE (4) - contact several occasions after the start losing ground. Shifted wider off heels rounding the bend then checked.
ZIPPING BUDDY (6) - checked start then made contact losing ground and shifting wider.
TYPICAL (7) - shifted in back straight making contact. Tightened making contact first turn. Brief contact from behind rounding the bend.
KAPAI TAHI (5) - slow away then tightened losing ground. Shifted wide final bend.
BIGTIME LEADS (1) - collided back straight and again first turn. Contact several occasions rounding the bend.
ASK KING JEFF (2) - slow away. Shifted out off heels first turn making solid contact.
TUFF'S MY MUM (3) - collided back straight losing ground. Contact rounding the bend.
STEFANO (6) - tightened making contact after the start. Contact several occasions back straight getting dictated wider then solid contact first turn losing ground.
BIG TIME JACKSON (7) - bumped after the start. Collided several occasions back straight and again first turn. Contact several occasions rounding the bend.

ODNOC ANKIE (9/4) - collided after the start. Shifted out back straight making contact several occasions then tightened and hampered losing ground. Veterinary examination revealed split webbing left fore with a 21 day stand down imposed.
